data.prayer: Over 14.05 percent of the people of Ribeira Grande de Santiago are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ribeira Grande de Santiago, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Ribeira Grande de Santiago, Cape Verde.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Ribeira Grande de Santiago, Cape Verde with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ribeira Grande de Santiago, Cape Verde a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cidade Velha
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cidade Velha, Ribeira Grande de Santiago, Cape Verde.
Father, remind your church in Ribeira Grande de Santiago, Cape Verde that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Ribeira Grande de Santiago. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.focus_label: Ribeira Grande de Santiago, Cape Verde
data.section_summary:
the state of Ribeira Grande de Santiago, Cape Verde has a population of 8,600.

We estimate Ribeira Grande de Santiago has 719 people who might know Jesus, 6,673 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,208 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Ribeira Grande de Santiago.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
